Texts.Chs:
顽抗地居住在寒冷地区的杂食性生物，其神秘的起源扎根于遥远的过去。

  ^orange;食性^reset;: 杂食性

^orange;天赋^reset;:
  HP x^green;1.15^reset;,
  ^green;抗性^reset;: +^green;40^reset;% 寒气抗性, +^green;25^reset;% 击退抗性
  +^green;5^reset;% 速度
  ^cyan;免疫^reset;: 液氮, 寒冷, 冰面
  +^green;75^reset; 饱腹上限

^orange;环境^reset;:
  寒冷生物群落: HP & 能量 x^green;1.15^reset;

^orange;武器^reset;:
  所有枪械: 伤害 x^green;1.1^reset;, +^green;5^reset;% 暴击伤害

^red;熔点^reset;:
  能量 x^red;0.88^reset;
  ^red;抗性^reset;: -^red;30^reset;% 火炎抗性 , -^red;10^reset;% 辐射抗性
Texts.Eng:
Resilient, cold-dwelling omnivorous creatures with a mysterious origin rooted in the distant past.

  ^orange;Diet^reset;: Omnivore

^orange;Perks^reset;:
  Health x^green;1.15^reset;,
  ^green;Resist^reset;: +^green;40^reset;% Ice, +^green;25^reset;% Knockback
  +^green;5^reset;% Speed
  ^cyan;Immune^reset;: Liquid Nitrogen, Cold, Ice
  +^green;75^reset; Max Food

^orange;Environment^reset;:
  In cold biomes: Health & Energy x^green;1.15^reset;

^orange;Weapons^reset;:
  All Guns: Damage x^green;1.1^reset;, +^green;5^reset;% Crit Damage

^red;Weaknesses^reset;:
  Energy x^red;0.88^reset;
  ^red;Resist^reset;: -^red;30^reset;% Fire , -^red;10^reset;% Radiation
